name: Underline (itch)
description:
Introduction Submission for the 'Mind the Gap' at Falmouth University.

Underline is a short puzzle game where you control the gates of an underground metro to ensure the trains arrive on schedule.

  • Involves underground/tube trains
  • 2 minute playing time
